nodes.text: Muunyaks were a non-sentient pack animal, native to the planet Jelucan. They were domesticated and used as the primary form of transportation by the planet's valley-dwellers until the introduction of ridgecrawlers by the Galactic Empire. Muunyaks were commonly used to carry supplies across the rugged terrain and were capable of walking nimbly along narrow ridges. Their wool was also used for producing clothing. The family of Ciena Ree was known to own a muunyak.
